meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joel Alderson Mandy Tuthill Josh Frumkin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6496.

td.p: Joel Alderson, a pathologist from Andover, Kansas
Mandy Tuthill, a public librarian from Milwaukee, Wisconsin
Josh Frumkin, a non-profit assistant director of donor relations from Germantown, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,200)

tr.td: CAPES OF ALL SHAPES
SHE CREATED HIM
SOMEBODY CALLED FOR A DOCTRINE
CHRISTMAS PARTIES
WHAT'S FOR LUNCH?
"B-L-T"
